The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
I am delighted to announce that information for the 2014 COBIS Games has now been finalised.
The Secondary Games – Years 7 and 8 students – Istanbul, Turkey The Primary Games – Year 5 and 6 students – Abu Dhabi
The COBIS Games is an elite sporting competition held over three days. Students selected will have to compete in Swimming, Football and Athletics.
To get a flavour of what the event is like, then please click on the link to view a video presentation on the 2013 Games. http://vimeo.com/67445908
If you would like your child to trial for the Games then please complete the letter in the links below and return it to your child's class teacher. Once you have confirmed your place at the trial, further information regarding exact locations will be confirmed.
Abu Dhabi Trials Istanbul Trials
Yours sincerely,
Adam Hoult Head of Physical Education The International School of Moscow World Class Education
